title: Oleg Valeryevich Smirnov
text:
Oleg Valeryevich Smirnov (; born 1 October 1990) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Volgar%20Astrakhan">FC Volgar Astrakhan</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Tambov">FC Tambov</a> on 11 July 2016 in a game against <a href="FC%20SKA-Khabarovsk">FC SKA-Khabarovsk</a>.
